articles.title: All the Head-Turning Security Tech I Saw at CES 2026 - CNET
articles.description: CES brought a crowd of security companies, all vying to impress with new cameras, sensors and locks. But here's what really caught my attention.
articles.content: We've seen the best CES 2026 has to offer, from robots folding laundry to singing lollipops. Now it's time to start thinking about what's impressing us the most. For me, that means evaluating all the… [+10327 chars]
